typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as integer,
		name as string,
		host_id as integer,
		host_name as string,
		neighbourhood_group as string,
		neighbourhood as string,
		latitude as double,
		longitude as double,
		room_type as string,
		price as float,
		minimum_nights as integer,
		number_of_reviews as integer,
		last_review as date 'MM/dd/yyyy',
		reviews_per_month as float,
		calculated_host_listings_count as integer,
		availability_365 as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ReadAirbnbData
ReadAirbnbData derive(name_clean = regexReplace(name, '[^A-Za-z0-9 ]|(  +)', ''),
		host_name_clean = regexReplace(name, '[^A-Za-z ]|(  +)', ''),
		neighborhood_clean = regexReplace(neighbourhood, '[^A-Za-z0-9 ]|(  +)', ''),
		room_type_clean = regexReplace(room_type, '[^A-Za-z0-9 ]|(  +)', '')) ~> CleanNameHostNameNeighborRoomType
CleanNameHostNameNeighborRoomType aggregate(groupBy(id),
	Count = count(id)) ~> RowCountForId
RowCountForId filter(Count>1) ~> GetDuplicates
GetDuplicates, ReadAirbnbData join(RowCountForId@id == ReadAirbnbData@id,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinRawColumns
JoinRawColumns derive(issue = concat('duplicates. (', toString(Count), ') times')) ~> AppendDuplicateDataIssue
AppendDuplicateDataIssue select(mapColumn(
		id = ReadAirbnbData@id,
		name,
		host_id,
		host_name,
		neighbourhood_group,
		neighbourhood,
		latitude,
		longitude,
		room_type,
		price,
		minimum_nights,
		number_of_reviews,
		last_review,
		reviews_per_month,
		calculated_host_listings_count,
		availability_365,
		issue
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
